verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye the sum <S%H7218><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, with the number <S%H4557><s%> of their names <S%H8034><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> by their polls <S%H1538><s%>;

From twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that are able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: thou and Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall number <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them by their armies <S%H6635><s%>.
And with you there shall be a man <S%H376><s%> of every <S%H376><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>; every one <S%H376><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you: of the tribe of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>; Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%>.
Of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>; Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%>.
Of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; Nachshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>.
Of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>; Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%>.
Of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>; Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>: of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>; Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>: of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>; Gamli'el <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%>.
Of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>; Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gid`oni <S%H1441><s%>.
Of Dan <S%H1835><s%>; Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%>.
Of Asher <S%H836><s%>; Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ocran <S%H5918><s%>.
Of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; Eliyahaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel <S%H1845><s%>.
Of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>; Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%>.

These were <S%H7148><s%> the renowned <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> in <S%H1992><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> these men <S%H582><s%> which are expressed <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by their names <S%H8034><s%>:

And they assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8689><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, and they declared their pedigrees <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8691><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>.
As the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so he numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, Yisra'EL's <S%H3478><s%> eldest son <S%H1060><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, were threescore and fourteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, namely, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>, throughout their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These are those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, being twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H259><s%> was for the house <S%H1004><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>.

So were all those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>;

Havahn all they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.
But the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> after the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8719><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Only thou shalt not number <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, neither take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:

But thou shalt appoint <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and over all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and over all things that belong to it: they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof; and they shall minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto it, and shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> setteth forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall take it down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: and when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to be pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall set it up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall pitch their tents <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> by his own camp <S%H4264><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard <S%H1714><s%>, throughout their hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

But the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%>, that there be no wrath <S%H7110><s%> upon the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> they.
